title: KLx (2022.01 - present)
descriptionHTML:
Software developer since January 2022. I was responsible for:
1) Developing and maintaining 2 applications: an online system that handles clearing and settlements of securities trade for shares and cash and an application that serves as a portal to exchange business information from and to banks.
2) Updating the Application Information Document of the corresponding application.
3) Working closely with Business Analysts and other members of the mainframe team.

title: INESC (2020.09 - 2021.11)
descriptionHTML:
Research developer from September 2020 to November 2021. I was responsible for:
1) Designing, refactoring and implementing dedicated algorithms (as well as automated tests to ensure their correctness and to assess their performance).
2) Integrating implemented algorithms into the existing JAVA library (BioLQM: https://github.com/colomoto/bioLQM/commits/master).
3) Implementing interfaces for other applications (GINsim and COLOMOTO Interactive Notebook) which enable them to use the JAVA library (bioLQM).
4) Providing written reports that ease the continued improvement of the work.
